text:
@Mike_Pence "their" administration proves many things among the myriad lies they tell. One is they have ABSOLUTELY NO
respect for human life.  

Not since day one. Not ever.

The thousands of deaths due to Covid19, Kids in Cages, taking away health care, poisoning water, etc.

Anti life.
